verbs.description: President Trump , likely in response to the new reporting about [ARG0: John Kelly] [V: calling] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: an " idiot] , " went off on the " Fake News " yet again tonight .

[ARG0: President Trump] , [ARGM-ADV: likely in response to the new reporting about John Kelly calling him an " idiot] , " [V: went] off [ARG4: on the " Fake News "] [ARGM-TMP: yet again] [ARGM-TMP: tonight] .
